website_summaries.verdict: Versatile, portable, and practical mat for a variety of different uses.
pros: Features rugged vinyl covering and foam core
Available in a variety of colors and 3 sizes, all  2 inches thick
Has hook-and-loop fasteners on all 4 sides
cons: Might be too firm for some users

customer_reviews.title: Alpaca Shearer Approved!
customer_reviews.text: Alpaca shearing. Thats right - Im using the 4x8 folding mat for alpaca shearing! You know of an alpaca toenail doesn't harm the mat - durability has got to be good! The mat has plenty of give for both my knees and the alpaca’s comfort. The hinged panels all are holding up well, the vinyl covering is durable enough to withstand the alpaca toenails digging in while we are putting them down or when the alpaca goes to get its footing and stand back up. We have hosed the mat off a few times - seems to be pretty well resistant to water absorption (along with resistant to alpaca pee, squirts and spit/drool). I highly recommend these mats!
customer_reviews.author: Jeri

customer_reviews.title: No complaints here
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my son and of course he loves it! To me I thought it was a little too firm but he says it’s supposed to be and he’ll break it in. He’s constantly using it along with the neighborhood kids and so far it’s holding up with no holes or damage. Plan on getting another one for him in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: N. McKnight

customer_reviews.title: Hard as a rock
customer_reviews.text: The reviews I saw were mixed as to whether this mat was too hard. Now that I own one, I am firmly (if you'll pardon the expression) in the "too hard" camp. It is slightly better than my ceramic tile floor. But not significantly better than laying a thin yoga mat over it. Also, despite having a velcro strip on one edge, it does not fold up tight. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Not 2" as advertised!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is NOT as advertised. It is only 1 1/2" in thickness, not the 2" thick as specified. Do not purchase if you want a 2" thick product.
customer_reviews.author: Roger B.

customer_reviews.title: All of my kids used this everyday
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a gymnast and my sons think they are super heroes in training. They practice backflips, fighting stances and general acrobatics. With this isolation/social distancing, I’ll take any fun imagination driven activity that takes time away from electronics. They have fun and it keeps them safe because it’s well padded, sturdy and easy to clean. We use it inside and outside on my grass. Mostly, we have it in the living room as it’s so hot outside. We love this mat.
customer_reviews.author: Ezinwanyi

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, comfy, sturdy, storage-friendly
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat! It's plush enough to stretch on comfortably, but firm enough to do squats and pushups on. And it's surprisingly lightweight, which makes it very easy to fold and adjust on the floor. It's a must-have for anyone with hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great Mats
customer_reviews.text: Using these mats for Jiu Jitsu while gyms are closed due to COVID-19. These mats are great. I was using old gymnastics mats before that were sort of sticky to prevent slipping during tumbling. These mats do not have that issue, I feel that I can move around easily. They are firm, and provide a good amount of cushion. They are pricey but I feel they are worth it! They fold up nicely and fit together great. Only "bad" thing is they attract ALL the hair. I have to clean them right before and after I use them, but it isn't too big of a deal :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brought them for my special needs son
customer_reviews.text: Using these mats for my special needs son who has issues with stability. These mats are a life saver and stop him from falling over and hurting himself. Really love these mats. They are huge and very sturdy. Easy to carry because they have handles and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: tasha

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Really like this mat. Seems to be well made and has ample padding. The only thing I would have liked is the velcro sticks to my carpet. So, I bought a roll of 2" velcro so I could put it on the mat velcro to prevent the it from sticking to or damaging our carpet. The velcro is a great idea if you want to join other mats to it but if you don't it is not needed. Other than that very happy.
customer_reviews.author: CraigW

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because it was larger and thicker than most mats. I needed it to do my exercises on because I have a bum knee and also because I can't lay down on a hard floor. This works out great! I have only had it for about a week so I don't know what the durability of it is. I use this twice a day, so I am curious to see how long it will last. That's why I did not rate the durability. It is very easy to fold up and fairly lightweight and easy to maneuver. I would definitely recommend this product!+
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Great mat - Easy Storage
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6-year old daughter and shes loves this mat. She is just now learning gymnastics and tumbling. She uses this in the house and is constantly flipping around. She was using the couch are for back-bends and such but this mat is great. No more boo-boos and she uses this everyday. We will end up buying the other pieces that Velcro underneath the sides of this mat. Storage is easy as it folds up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: asht

customer_reviews.title: Baggy vinyl covering - DO NOT BUY!!! LOOK ELSEWHERE!!! IMPRACTICAL TO RETURN!!!
customer_reviews.text: The vinyl material is very loose and wrinkles when you step on it. We previously purchased a cheaper, better constructed mat I think it was Best Choice Products 4'x10'x2 Gymnastics Gym Folding Exercise Aerobics Mats Stretching Yoga Mat. The PU material was very taut. We may have paid around $80 for two 4'x8' mats. Unfortunately, these new mats are not made with the same care but are too expensive to pack and return. We'll just set them on fire instead.
customer_reviews.author: Ribbit ribbit

customer_reviews.title: Material Baggy and loose on frame
customer_reviews.text: The material is a bit baggy and loose, gaping All over , Seams could have been better reinforced and tighter. quality has gone down from years past.
customer_reviews.author: NRB

customer_reviews.title: I recommend them
customer_reviews.text: Using them for BJJ drills and stretching.they are thick and they can handle Judo throws nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Jeebers

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mats
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these for BJJ and so far they have been pretty comfortable and convenient but we’ll probably need at least one more. Great product for the value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big logo
customer_reviews.text: Nice mat. My only complaint is the very large wesellmats logo. Guys, it’s MY mat and I paid you a fair price for it. Get your name/advertisement off my mat.
customer_reviews.author: John Loomis

customer_reviews.title: Rock hard
customer_reviews.text: Warning. This mat is hard as a rock. Seriously. I wanted to use it to do back exercises but I can't even lay on it. The foam is just too firm like a tire.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Best mat EVER
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Wow! Wow! I’ve been in the fitness/ martial arts game for 30 yrs and this could quite possibly be the best product and value for money I’ve EVER seen! I’m beyond happy with this, I have a self defense class approaching and am so happy to be able to use this for demos etc. I can’t believe how light n compact yet durable it is.
customer_reviews.author: G go

customer_reviews.title: Very good exercise mat for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great folding exercise mat. The vinyl covering holds up really well and the run beer foam is nice and stiff. It doesn't give much when pressed hard against it like some other brands. I highly recommend it for doing floor exercises like yoga or body weight exercises. It's easily foldable as well.
customer_reviews.author: R.H.

customer_reviews.title: excellent foot traction
customer_reviews.text: Very glad i bought this excersize mat from We Sell Mats. Excellent quality, accurate advertising. Will likely buy more. I was worried my cats would scratch upon or even pee on the mat but gladly neither of these things has happened. It does NOT have that funky plastic smell that cats find so attractive to pee on. It has excellent traction so if you will be needing to slide or twist your feet ( kendo -taikwando) this mat is NOT a good choice for that.
customer_reviews.author: NinjaTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Sturdy Mat
customer_reviews.text: We bought this since my daughter now has all of her dance classes in the living room. This makes a great mat for acro and we also put it under a board for ta dancing. It gives her nice flexibility, but still sturdy. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SeenaS

customer_reviews.title: Bought after much research/ still satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Researched all the mats on Amazon including their reviews. Settled on this one and may even purchase another 8x4 to attach together for boys home wrestling practice. It’s being used now for adult sit-ups and stretching. I also like how light it is to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Durable and heavy mats
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, thick, and durable mats. We use them inside our home for a toddler jungle play area. He has fallen and just pops right back up. The handles are strong and durable too. The only thing I didn't expect was hook and loop on the underside of the mats. We had to buy the opposite side hook and loop to put under the mat to protect or area rugs. I didn't want the strong side to pull fibers in my rug. Easy enough fix and you can't even see it. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Schultheis

customer_reviews.title: The Velcro edges keep it in place when used on a rug!
customer_reviews.text: This gym mat is perfect! We bought the 4x8 one and it’s the perfect size for my 9 year old to practice on. It’s durable and easy to fold up and put away too. We use it in my daughters room on top of her rug. Our old mat kept sliding every time she used it. This one has Velcro on the edges to attach other mats to it but the Velcro sticks to the rug and keeps it from sliding when it’s being used. Very happy with this mat!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grandkids for Christmas because they had been taking a gymnastics class and thought it would be something they could grow with not to mention soften their landing when they attempt a cartwheel. I asked them recently if they had used it and both of them said that they had used it about every day. Good padding and it’s very well made. Great price and delivered on time.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Green

customer_reviews.title: Quality, price, shipping also, honesty from seller
customer_reviews.text: Great mat. Shipped fast. Just as pictured and true to size. Bought one before this believing the size was 4x8x2 as stated by seller and upon receiving found out it had a 21/2 inch gap in length and width. Had to return it back. Love this gym mat. Do highly recomend it
customer_reviews.author: momlove

customer_reviews.title: Highly rec the 10 length.
customer_reviews.text: We got the 8 length and it’s great but with the 10 you have more room to tumble and it can always be folded
customer_reviews.author: Samantha S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Mat for Tumbl Trac Jr. Kip Bar
customer_reviews.text: Item took a few extra days to arrive, even with Amazon Prime, but it did arrive just as described and fits perfectly under my daughter's Tumbl Trac Jr. Bar. It completed my daughter's mini gymnastics training room:)
customer_reviews.author: Rosie B.

customer_reviews.title: awesome mat, great value
customer_reviews.text: Been using heavily maybe 90 minutes per week for the past couple months and so far, no signs of wear. Cleans easily. Very well-made (seems so anyway). Not too soft, good shock absorption. Nice locking velcro features for connecting multiple mats or securing to a wall/floor. The logo doesn't look too cool but for the price, I'll manage.
customer_reviews.author: big daddy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I got this thinking it would just be okay to work out on in the garage. Its amazing quality! I love it and so does everyone else in the house. We use it to work out and the kids use it to lay on. The color is so pretty, just like the picture. If I ever need more I will get this excat one!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal  Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Mat
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as I expected. Appears to be well made; easy to fold and move around. Padding is firm and typical thickness for a safe gym mat. Colors are bold and attractive. I recommend and would order again!
customer_reviews.author: NDR

customer_reviews.title: great mats
customer_reviews.text: great mats for wrestling etc they are 2inches thick and easy to move and take with you and also light weight as well
customer_reviews.author: N.H.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for floor exercises.
customer_reviews.text: I like the mat. The floor area I have is too small for this mat. The mat is folded in four sections I only used it once. Partly because I have been too busy with other things. Winter is coming, maybe I'll use more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth R. Beamish

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mat.
customer_reviews.text: We used this to create a small play area on our hardwood floors for our infant son. Very nice - solid. The foam is relatively dense which, IMHO, provides an adequate amount of protection against a fall without making the mat so squishy that you just sink into it. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Web Geek

customer_reviews.title: Have only had it for a few days, but so far it is great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mat. I had wanted a wide mat and this is perfect. I also love that it is 2 inches thick. It folds easily and had handles to use to carry it. I cannot comment on the durability as it has only been a few days, but will revisit this review in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Capt PierceTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Just like the mat from high school. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just like the mat from high school. Love it! It's well made, padded, and light weight to easy to carry with the black straps. I like the size bc it's big enough for me to stretch out comfortably and do yoga or any other exercises. I'm not a small person and it is large enough for me and I purchased the 4x8 Would be but again!
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Very professional for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great mats for the money. They interlock with Velcro. If buying for jiujutsu, you’ll need at least two. They take up a lot of room folded. The best way to stor them is to hang them on a garage wall, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: High quality product. Very thick, light and easy to handle. My 7 yr old has no trouble setting it up and putting it away by herself.
customer_reviews.author: gb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for zoom classes
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 6 year old to take zoom tumbling from her dance studio. Long enough for her to do all of the “moves” and routine. Padded enough to provide support for rolls and stretches. Folds up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Leighty

customer_reviews.title: Good quality craftsmanship, durable.
customer_reviews.text: We have only had ours for a couple of months but it has held up really well. Good quality cushioning thay is easy on the joints. It was nice to find the perfect size for the room I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: A little on the hard side
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mat to provide myself a training area to work on the floor. They seem to be a little on the hard side. Not the type of mat where I would want to be thrown into or all onto. Otherwise, quality seems good so far.
customer_reviews.author: cr

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginner gymnastics!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old who is just starting out in gymnastics. She loves it and it makes me feel better that she has extra cushioning when doing somersaults, handstands, and cartwheels. It is small so she will likely outgrow it very quickly or we will need to buy an additional one to velcro to it. I also use it for light stretching. It is lightweight and easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: DLMack13

customer_reviews.title: A good tumbling mat
customer_reviews.text: Good product: easy to fold, bright colors, foam density is thick. Package arrive wrapped in tarp, light for shipment and earth friendly. In my opinion, it's on the pricey side.
customer_reviews.author: Sophee

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fitness mat
customer_reviews.text: This mat is great for exercise, and thanks to the way it folds it is easy to store. It's quite thick, giving good cushioning while still being pretty firm, which is great for exercise.
customer_reviews.author: C.B.S. van der Sar

customer_reviews.title: Nice mat!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mat! Easy to fold and move. Also thick and sturdy (your feet don't sink to the ground when standing on it). Glad I purchased!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Color is great, quality is great... we actually leave it outside on our porch with my daughters gymnastics bar (also purchased on amazon) holding up well so far :)
customer_reviews.author: shanelle

customer_reviews.title: This works great for judo
customer_reviews.text: I take judo and this works just fine for my falls and grappling. It has held up great.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard

customer_reviews.title: It's a Perfect Fit!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this mat for my grandaughter to go with the gymnastics bar her parents bought her for Christmas. She loves it. It's actually even thicker than I expected, which is only good news since the thicker, the better. Very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie M

customer_reviews.title: Firm and Spacious
customer_reviews.text: Nice firm pads that unfold easily and velcro together for easy storage. The durable cover seems as good as the old wrestling mats.
customer_reviews.author: D. Nuzzolo

customer_reviews.title: Great for home use.
customer_reviews.text: Close to what you see in gyms. The covering is a bit loose so it has room to tear if it's used a ton or abused.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great for gymnastics and more.
customer_reviews.text: Bought together with beam. My kids love these mats. Main use is for gymnastic practice at home, but the kids do play with it by building forts as well. Great use. Would buy more. Also, fits perfectly on our 8ft beam (purchased 2).
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Ordered it in Purple, arrived in blue
customer_reviews.text: It's nice, doesn't go with my color concept of pinks and purples in my workout area. I am giving it 1 star because it's not what I ORDERED. It's too big to send back to get the right color.
customer_reviews.author: Nooshin

customer_reviews.title: We Sell Mats Rocks!!
customer_reviews.text: Mats are great quality! Got these for two toddlers who live in an apartment not made for little kids. Just a two year old running across the floor causes the place to shake. Not any more! 2 4x8 mars and they have a safer and quieter place to play!! Seller is top notch!! Shipped first thing Monday morning and had them to me the next day!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Edmisten

customer_reviews.title: Good for gymnastics
customer_reviews.text: Great for my daughter's virtual gymnastics class. Size is perfect and comfortable. My daughter is happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: irivera

customer_reviews.title: Great for jiu jiitsu drills
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. I use it for solo jiu jitsu drills going on 3 weeks now. Easy to fold & move. Stitching is holding up very well. And padding is firm enough for mat drills & falling. Clean after every session w/diluted pine sol
customer_reviews.author: Trenton Nishibun

customer_reviews.title: Multi functional
customer_reviews.text: This mat is perfect. Very dense foam, easy to handle and perfect for exercise. I will use this as a guest mattress with a down feather cover. I love the blue/black and solid black on the other side. Lots of Velcro to combine mats if neexed. Great price. Delivered promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Donna MP

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and super fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and super fast shipping. I will buy another one to add on to the current mat when my daughter needs more room. Makes me feel much better that she has this to tumble and flip on rather than the carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Annis

customer_reviews.title: Great for Jiu Jitsu
customer_reviews.text: I had a very hard time finding AFFORDABLE mats of high quality but this is it. If you combine these with another set you've got an 8 x 16 area that a pair can share and do about as much rolling as you need.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Luftman

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect mat for a little gymnast. Our daughter uses this daily for gymnastics or to create a bed to lay on! Very durable as our 65 pouch loves it too!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Tumbling matt
customer_reviews.text: Conveniently fold and easy to move however does not offer as much cushion as hoped. Very firm initially but broke down quickly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Arrived earlier than expected. Good quality of matress. My daughter is starting in cheerleading and gymnastics and has been using it for practice at home.
customer_reviews.author: elba lopez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mat. Very thick
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mat. Very thick, and has a nice handle to carry when folded. We are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: K.M.

customer_reviews.title: Good mat
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my little gymnast- she can practice at home her stunts safely
customer_reviews.author: jahoda

customer_reviews.title: great value, fair price and prompt delivery
customer_reviews.text: great value, fair price and prompt delivery. my girls have been using them for gymnastics play in our basement and it provides a much more protective surface. I bought 2 and was happy that they velcro together and are easily transportable
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home gym, but I wouldn’t use commercially.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t love how soft they are, but they are well made.
customer_reviews.author: ISFLY

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love this exercise mat
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 5 year old granddaughter and 2 year old grandson in the Blue/green color combo. Both love it. Granddaughter does her cartwheels and grandson loves it as well. My granddaughter said that this was the best present ever. It seems very durable and can be folded up for storage when not being used. Highly recommend this mat and ordering and having the mat shipped to my home was very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far very rugged and just the right firmness for TKD practice, rolling, etc
customer_reviews.author: D. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. Shipping could have been better.
customer_reviews.text: The mat itself is great. Same feel as the ones you remember from school:) Would leave 5 stars except that the shipping was slow and it didn't turn up until well after the estimate.
customer_reviews.author: Hoffman's Natural

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This is a professional grade mat. It more than meets my expectations, and the weight makes it easy to set up, move, and store. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Araxiel

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy. My daughter has taken some falls onto it from her bar and she just gets up and keeps on going.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great mat
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to our granddaughter to go along with the adjustable bar that Santa brought her. It is a nice thick mat. It fit perfectly under the bar. It can be used for tumbling too.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Miller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Mat
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice mats. The one I received has a strip on all four side so it can be connected to other mats. The mat stays in place on carpet and on hardwood.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift wanted by my granddaughter for her cheer and dance practices. She absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: EZ Top

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mat for kids
customer_reviews.text: Good quality mat. Perfect for kids to tumble. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mat
customer_reviews.text: These are great and for some reason cheaper on amazon than company site
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and well made, large enough for an adult to practice cartwheels on.
customer_reviews.author: xm44927

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: working well for our disabled granddaughter to complete her daily exercises
customer_reviews.author: Debra Shovlin

customer_reviews.title: All day fun for little ones
customer_reviews.text: Our son is 18 months old and this is the best toy we own. He climbs over it, crawls under it, uses it as a peek a boo wall, rolls cars down it as a ramp,... The best toy ever.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Schirripa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect exercise mat
customer_reviews.text: Seemed a little expensive, until they arrived. This mat is lightweight but durable. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Desta

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Mat
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mat for our little gymnast!!! Great size and exceptional quality!!! Love the handles to make transporting and storing easy!!
customer_reviews.author: SHague

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: Really nice mat. My girls like the carrying handles, so they can move the mat easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline A Brenneman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is gonna bs 7. It’s perfect for the house. She’s loves it
customer_reviews.author: Manashevitz

customer_reviews.title: Great mat for $
customer_reviews.text: Just as good as our competitive gymnasts facility mats. Wipe clean easily. Colors as shown. Soft, bouncy, supportive.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi T

customer_reviews.title: Great cushioning for workouts!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great mat! I bought it to help my knees during mixed martial arts workouts that have a ton of jumping. Happy to report this mat provides great support and doesn't move around. Definitely going to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Best may by far
customer_reviews.text: By far best may. Velcro prevents slipping on floor, higher quality material prevents slipping on feet and limbs on the mat (other less quality vinyls are very slippery) folds easy
customer_reviews.author: dee17danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Mat works out great! No issues, daughter loves it. Great size.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Downs

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: Well made and seems that it will durable. Reminds me of the type we used pin public school gym classes.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Shores

customer_reviews.title: holding up well
customer_reviews.text: these are a good thickness and hold up well. Also store well.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mat for my daughter to practice cartwheels, gymnastics and dance moves.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Using with the kip bar for kids to practice gymnastics. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Duenwen Hsiao

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gymnastics practice!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this to practice her cartwheels and hand stands! Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Treena

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old is getting into gymnastics and this mat is perfect for her. Length and thickness is just right.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, heavy duty mat. Comparable to those found in a gym. Much better than another one that I tried.
customer_reviews.author: ChopperJockey

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: The mat is very well made. It is thick enough to give you cushion during exercise movements. It is also easy to move and fold up when you want it out of the way. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Altadonna

customer_reviews.title: Best for home gymnastics
customer_reviews.text: I love that my kids can continue to cartwheel and tumble while we are at home. Easy, durable, practical, and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: GBaChoura

customer_reviews.title: Great mats, firm and soft
customer_reviews.text: Great mats, firm and soft. Highly resemble what’s in the actual gym. Eas to put away compact so to speak.
customer_reviews.author: AnnaRN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect at home Matt for gymnastics
customer_reviews.text: Great mat for my girls to do gymnastics on. The thickness is perfect and it folds up easily to put away
customer_reviews.author: Tbelle

customer_reviews.title: great mats
customer_reviews.text: love to sit on these mats, as a parent of a two year old we spend a lot of time on the floor.... it absorbs the sound too since we have downstairs neighbors who can hear us walk, dance, wrestle....
customer_reviews.author: Cyn

customer_reviews.title: Good mats, light weight.
customer_reviews.text: Using for training mats for self defense, defensive tactics. Very light weight but still provides good padding for training.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Avnet

customer_reviews.title: perfect for exercise or gymnastics
customer_reviews.text: Very thick, perfect for exercise or gymnastics. It's a good size and folds up nicely. They're just like the mats you used back in school for gym class.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Eang

product_meta.title: We Sell Mats 4 ft x 8 ft x 2 in Personal Fitness & Exercise Mat, Lightweight and Folds for Carrying
feature_bullets: FOLDING EXERCISE MAT FOR PADDED PROTECTION: Our Fitness Gym mat is available in 3 sizes with 2" foam thickness for a cushioned, supportive surface that protects knees, wrists, elbows & backs for home workouts & bodyweight exercises.

EASY TO CARRY AND STORE: Lightweight, foldable design makes it portable and compact for storage, with carrying handles for convenient on-the-go-fitness for personal trainers, athletes, exercising outdoors or indoor workouts.

GYM FLOOR MAT FOR PERSONAL FITNESS: Ultra-durable and sturdy cross-linked foam is designed to handle personal fitness and bodyweight exercises such as push-ups, sit-ups, crunches, squats, lunges and more.
PERFECT FOR KIDS & YOUNG GYMNASTS: Durable and cushioned pads provide safety and reassurance for your young gymnast or cheerleader as they practice tumbling, cartwheels and back handsprings.

HASSLE-FREE CLEAN-UP: Unfold over any hardwood floor or flat indoor surface for extra padding needed when exercising. Vinyl surface resists tearing and is easy to wipe clean with a simple soap and water solution.
